summary: That\'s my try to create a bit stronger green to fit the orcish weapons and shield.
descriptionHtml:
It\'s well known that the armor of the Orcs does not have the same look like the weapon sets or even the shield. At least I hope the differences aren\'t so obvious now...
I tried to give the armor more green to let it look more simliar to Orichalcum.
It\'s only a little re-texture of the male and female version.
Hope you like my very first mod, though it\'s created quite without skill...

To install:

Just copy the texture folder into the data folder of your Skyrim installation.
author: B01scout
